name: Reactangle
description:
Welcome to Reactable! A < 250 line code reaction time game written in 1 script... is that impressive. no.

This currently is just a prototype idea, and will slowly be made more appealing towards your eyes.

There are 3 game modes currently:
- Normal
Get 5 lives and play up to a regulated Speed
- No Color
Get 5 lives and play without seeing the colour of picked Reactable
- Speed
Get 1 Life and go as fast as you can!

[V0.2 Update]
- Improved User Interface
- Added nice Background Effect
- Visual Assets
- Added tiny sound effects
- Capped FPS to 144 (Play V0.1 for Uncapped)
- Fixed Score not saving sometimes
- Fixed Reaction text not stating "ms"


To exit the standalone, use alt+f4 (or alt+enter and then X out)
